name: Dog and God
location: Sierra Madre, in a cell in theVilla police station

topics.topic_text: FollowersAcknowledgeMyOrder
topics.response_text: {Affirmative growl}Hhh-hhnn. Dog hears you.

topics.topic_text: It's time for us to part ways.
topics.response_text: {Sad, questioning}Why you send Dog away? Dog hear you right?

topics.topic_text: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
topics.response_text: {Pleased he's not fired}Dog stays.

topics.topic_text: Yes, I'm sure.
topics.response_text: {Dismissed, whines a bit like a whipped dog}Dog will leave.

topics.topic_text: I think we should travel together.
topics.response_text: {Shakes head, player already has a follower}Nnnn-Nnn... too many, Dog waits until you lose one...{beat}maybe let Dog feed?

topics.topic_text: Let's get going.
topics.response_text: {Agreeable, been told to follow}Rhhhr. Dog will follow.

topics.topic_text: FollowersOverburdened
topics.response_text: {Negatory, asked to carry too much, then whines a bit, like he's like to help but can't}Hnnh-Nnn. Dog can't carry any more.

topics.topic_text: FollowersStealthing
topics.response_text: {Quiet, stealthy, low growl}Hnnnn. Dog is following.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about your tactics.
topics.response_text: Hnnrrh? What do you want Dog to do?

topics.topic_text: I want you to change your combat style.
topics.response_text: {Puzzled}Hrnnnh? What do you want?

topics.topic_text: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
topics.response_text: {Low growl}Hrrrrrrrrrrr... Dog will do that.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: {Nods}Hnnnh... Dog is listening.

topics.topic_text: That's all. Let's get going.
topics.response_text: {Nods, affirmative}Dog hears you, will follow.

topics.topic_text: Switch to a melee weapon.
topics.response_text: {Surprised, then agrees}Dog good at smashing things that move with bear trap.

topics.topic_text: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
topics.response_text: {Confused, then shrugs}Only if save pieces for Dog...

topics.topic_text: I want you to use ranged weapons.
topics.response_text: {Slow, confused, then gives in}Dog will try... trigger and sight... Dog prefer to hit with bear trap.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about how close you're following me.
topics.response_text: {Confused}Hnnh?

topics.topic_text: Stay close to me.
topics.response_text: {Pleased}Hrnnnh, Dog will be kin. Like others in night.

topics.topic_text: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
topics.response_text: {Agrees}Hnnh-hnnn.

topics.topic_text: All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
topics.response_text: {Eager, chomping at the bit}Hnhhr!

topics.topic_text: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
topics.response_text: {Slightly disappointed}Hnn.

topics.topic_text: Enough about tactics.
topics.response_text: {Nods}Hnnh-nnn. Dog not sure he remember anyway.

topics.topic_text: Let's trade equipment.
topics.response_text: {Affirmative}Dog fetches... will share... have food?

topics.topic_text: Wait here.
topics.response_text: {Squats down, heels, agreeing tone}Hrnnh. Dog will wait.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: {DUPE: Dog, Slightly malicious}Dog will obey. Dog will stay here... for now.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01DeanToDogTopic01
topics.response_text: {Curious, slow}I don't remember you. Who are you.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01DeanToDogTopic02
topics.response_text: {Slow, to himself}Reminds me, keeps the voice out of my head. He can't talk when the pain's howling at me.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01DeanToDogTopic03
topics.response_text: {Slow question, starts getting evil}Run from Dog? Dog knows how to hunt. Dog will find you, tear you apart.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01DogDevourTopic01
topics.response_text: {Growling, just fed, slightly full}Hnnhhhh...{bestial}Dog getting full.{Dog's bark after devouring one of the Ghost People, happy to feed.}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01DogDialogueKitchenNotListen
topics.response_text: {Snarling}Not listen,{emph}Dog out of cage now.{Ignoring the player's Pip-Boy audio message.}

topics.topic_text: We need to get you to the Gala Event. Get you to your place.
topics.response_text: Dog... Dog has heard that before. Was there pretty lights?{Frowns, gets a little more focused}There... were things to pull? Hard to pull, but Dog did. And...{quiet}a cage.{Dog, slowly remembering he triggered the Gala Event once already, and bad memories associated with it.}

topics.topic_text: Have orders for you - for going, staying, all that.
topics.response_text: {Nods}Dog is listening.

topics.topic_text: Come on, then. I won't make it easy on you.
topics.response_text: {Snarling, evil, malicious}Dog will crush you, snap your bones, make red everywhere.{<Dog howls with murderous rage>}

topics.topic_text: Dog! Stay! If you don't, Master will be mad!
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Stops in mid-attack}Hnnh? Master?{Beat}Don't want Master to be mad... what does Master want Dog to...

topics.topic_text: No, hold it tightly by the neck - now sink your teeth into it, tear it apart.
topics.response_text: {Dog, eager, slightly amazed}...knows now. Voice was always small...{stronger}Dog could have torn it apart, eaten it all this time, tear it...

topics.topic_text: Dog, hidden on you is the key. Find it, and toss it to me.
topics.response_text: Dog... Dog doesn't have a... hnh. Here it is.{Frowns}Dog... Dog didn't know it was there.{Frowns, suspicious}How did it get there?

topics.topic_text: I need your obedience. First, I'm going to show you a trick.
topics.response_text: Does Master want Dog to fetch someone?{Beat, quiet}Dog will hunt down whoever you want, bring them here.

topics.topic_text: Now that you are awake, Master wants you to listen, Dog.
topics.response_text: {Nods, quiet}Master, Dog is here. What does Master want?{Confused, then reverent, obedient.}

topics.topic_text: Just give me the key - you want out of the cage, don't you?
topics.response_text: {Good Node, slightly confused}Yes, Master... Master sounds different, quieter. Master...{Beat}Dog doesn't want to be in the cage any more. Dog will be good this time, Dog promises.{Confused because he's used to Elijah being mean, and the player's being nice.}

topics.topic_text: Shut up, reject, and give me the key. Now.
topics.response_text: {Bad Node: Cringing}Yes, Master. Here, Dog sorry, Dog... just...{Beat}just let Dog out of the cage. Don't want to be here any longer.

topics.topic_text: Yes, well, it had to be done. Now, I need you to remain here.
topics.response_text: {Frowns, building determination, getting empowered}Now{emph}Dog speak. Now Dog not afraid.{Beat}And...{frowns}hungry.{Emph}More hungry.{Dog is free, has child-like empowerment. He'll now eat, kill, smash whatever he wants without any restraint - except player.}

topics.topic_text: Fine. Let's go, follow me.
topics.response_text: Yes, Master. Dog waited a long time... brought you many people. Dog will follow.

topics.topic_text: Go to the Fountain and wait for me there.
topics.response_text: {Eager, a little quiet}Master, Dog waited a long time... brought you many people. If Dog finds more, will bring them to the Fountain, Dog promises.

topics.topic_text: Master needs you to pull on the chain on your neck as hard as you can.
topics.response_text: {Nods, about to kill himself}Yes, Master.{Quiet}Dog hopes to see you soon.{Strangely calm as he's about to commit suicide, almost matter-of-fact as he slavishly obeys orders.}

topics.topic_text: What weapons are you good at?
topics.response_text: Dog good at punching... hitting people with metal bear jaw until they go quiet.

topics.topic_text: <Storage Node. Do Not Translate.>
topics.response_text: ...hungry.{Evil, greedy}Come here, or Dog will chase you, break you until you no run anymore.

topics.topic_text: Dog, do you know why you have to go to the position on the map?
topics.response_text: {Confused}Hard to pull things...? Dog has to pull very, very hard to...{beat, slow fear/curious}are we going there?

topics.topic_text: Do you know how the Ghost People taste?
topics.response_text: {Slightly sour-faced, shakes head}Taste like plastic and copper. Gas inside, in pockets, hssss when teeth sinks into them.

topics.topic_text: So Master vanished around that time.
topics.response_text: {Nods}Master went away until you show up with him on your arm.

topics.topic_text: If the casino already opened, what are we doing here?
topics.response_text: {Shrugs}Don't know.{Beat}Dog keep bringing people here.

topics.topic_text: {Dog}I had questions for you.
topics.response_text: {Nods, obedient}Yes, Master.

topics.topic_text: I watched you devour one of the Ghost People.
topics.response_text: {Slight irritation, frustration}Dog doesn't like to eat them always, sometimes so many. Keep stabbing Dog, cutting him.

topics.topic_text: Doesn't that make the voice mad?
topics.response_text: {A little quieter}Voice doesn't get mad when Dog feeds on the people here. Voice not like Ghost People, worried there are too many to eat, too many knives.

topics.topic_text: Why do you eat the Ghost People?
topics.response_text: {Slight frustration, treating them like bees that get in the way of his honey}Dog doesn't like to eat them always, sometimes so many.

topics.topic_text: Did you bring me here?
topics.response_text: {Affirmative}Dog fetches. Dragged you here... Dog thinks. You not struggle like others. Trap makes you sleep, make your voice go to cage.

topics.topic_text: Do you know the way back?
topics.response_text: Might find way back if Master lets you go. If he not want you to go, he makes head red spray.{Thinking, to himself}Then Dog has to find another one.

topics.topic_text: Ready for more? Come on, let's finish this.
topics.response_text: {Snarling, then roars as he launches himself at player}Nrrrrrrh... rhhhhharrhhh!

topics.topic_text: Dog! Stop! Or Master will be mad!
topics.response_text: {DUPE}[SUCCEEDED]{Stops in mid-attack}Hnnh? Master?{Beat}Don't want Master to be mad... what does Master want Dog to...

topics.topic_text: Dog, the Master sent me. He commands you to listen to my voice now.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Confused}Master?{Beat, quiet, reverent}Master... Dog... Dog is listening.

topics.topic_text: Dog, listen to the other voice inside now. Go to sleep, let him come out.
topics.response_text: {Frightened}If... if other voice comes out... Dog... Dog won't wake up. Dog doesn't want to sleep, please don't make him...{Script Notes: Player is coaxing Dog to give up, letting God emerge.}

topics.topic_text: The other voice? See it in your head - not as a voice, but as a ball, the size of your hand.
topics.response_text: {Dog, Confused, curious, as if holding a ball in his hand}Dog... Dog never thought of the voice as... small. As something he could hold...{Dog's about to eat his imaginary personality, killing it.}

topics.topic_text: You're not leaving me any choice, I have to stop you.
topics.response_text: {Sad}Dog is sorry, so sorry, didn't want to, but...

topics.topic_text: Take that chain around your neck, grab the ends, and pull slow and hard until you hear a crack.
topics.response_text: {Nods, about to kill himself}Yes, Dog can do that.{Quiet}Dog hopes to see you soon.{Strangely calm as he's about to commit suicide, almost matter-of-fact as he slavishly obeys orders.}

topics.topic_text: <Storage Node for Final Battle, Likes Player Topics. Do Not Translate.>
topics.response_text: ...you, you need to go, run.{Whispering, as if confiding in player}Dog is going to burn voice... burn voice out, burn it away.

topics.topic_text: If you try to burn the voice out of you, this casino will be destroyed, and us along with it.
topics.response_text: Dog is tired of voice inside, tired of being in another cage, again. Try to...

topics.topic_text: This is important - do you remember what happened exactly?
topics.response_text: {Clams up, quiet}Dog can't remember.{Beat, quiet}Don't want to go, can't make him stay there.

topics.topic_text: Dog, think back to the lights, the pretty ones.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Slightly wary, warming up}The lights were pretty. In the sky. Pointed at casino.{Beat, like wonder}And the casino opened up.

topics.topic_text: Could I find my way back?
topics.response_text: Maybe. Not sure you could find way back once leave. Dog has to smell and hunt for path back here sometimes...{frowns}Cloud keep moving.{Last part - "finding road back is hard, buddy."}

topics.topic_text: Imagine the voice, not as a voice... but as water. Look at the voice now, what do you see?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Dog can{emph}see the voice.{Frowns, studying his reflection}Looks just like Dog...

topics.topic_text: Then... step into the water, step into yourself.
topics.response_text: If Dog... if Dog goes into the water... Dog can't help if Master gets mad.{Beat, sad}You were nice to Dog, Dog{emph}wants to help.{Script Notes: Dog is trying to be nice in this node. Doesn't want to be sent away.}

topics.topic_text: Fine, reject. You want to die? I'll accomodate you.
topics.response_text: {Sad, despairing}Dog doesn't want to die. But the voice keeps shouting, and...

topics.topic_text: Dog, that voice doesn't control you, all right?
topics.response_text: {Sad}Dog tried to shut it out, tried to hurt self enough to make it...

topics.topic_text: Do you need to eat them to make them stay down?
topics.response_text: {Slow}No... if you rip their arms off... or legs, mask people stay down. Easier to rip off legs and arms when they fall on ground, just keep hitting them.{Thinking it over.}

topics.topic_text: Forget it. I'm sick of dragging you around anyway.
topics.response_text: Dog knows... please... help Dog end the voice, Dog just wants it to go away. Dog...

topics.topic_text: I don't mean you any harm... you just need to calm down, focus.
topics.response_text: Dog tried. Just hard... hard to hear over voice sometimes... so loud... pain... pain...

topics.topic_text: When we were sneaking, you mentioned Lou... who's Lou?
topics.response_text: Lou... ten... ant? Long ago. Smart.{Beat}Gave us all things to do. Like watch. And kill.{Beat}Gone now.{Confused, then sad. He's referring to "Lou" an old Lieutenant from a previous game, it's a nod to history.}

topics.topic_text: So... dismemberment and disintegrations take them down.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Dism... disin...{gives up}chop legs off while stand up, eat when fall down. If not that, make them electric ash.{Tries to say dismemberment and disintegrations, gives up.}

topics.topic: NVDLC01DogDialogueNVDLC01DogTopic079Look, listen to my voice, maybe... maybe I can help.
topics.topic_text: Dog, I stopped because I don't want to hurt you - now listen. I want to help.
topics.response_text: {DUPE}[SUCCEEDED]{Nods, slowly}You... were kind to Dog. Dog will listen... Dog is glad you came...

topics.topic_text: How do you do it?
topics.response_text: Dog knows where to hit them, make them stay down... base of neck, lower back, hit it hard enough, life snaps out of them.

topics.topic_text: Can you show me where?
topics.response_text: Dog can... see where back of collar is? Follow down, to lower back - hit neck, middle back, right on spine, crack. Then they not get back up.

topics.topic_text: Dog... just calm down... there's no need to keep fighting.
topics.response_text: {Getting more and more angry}No... Dog no listen to you, no listen to your voice anymore - will tear you apart, feed on you.

topics.topic_text: Is that why you have a bear trap locked on your arm?
topics.response_text: Dog put his hand in it, hurts. Made the voice go away, now can't get it off. Don't want it off, hurt keeps voice sleeping...{angrier, yet pleased}bleeding.

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me how you got to the Sierra Madre?
topics.response_text: {Confused}Here? Followed voice in air, then here... here as long as can remember.{Hushes voice a bit}Don't like this place... hard to find things to eat sometimes.

topics.topic_text: Those scars on your body - where did you get them?
topics.response_text: {Shrugs, a little sad/sheepish}Hurt self. Hurt makes the voice go away... it doesn't like pain.

topics.topic_text: I need you to stay here and trigger the switches.
topics.response_text: {Complaining}Dog doesn't understand...{to himself}too hungry, hard to hear words...{slightly petulant and evil here}Master, when can Dog{emph}feed.{< Dog complains about being hungry and doesn't understand what to do when the player is asking him to trigger the Gala Event. >}

topics.topic_text: {Dog}That's enough for now.
topics.response_text: Hnnh-hnn.

topics.topic_text: Your name is carved on your chest. Is that part of it?
topics.response_text: Yes...{frowns}no... don't know what the word means, everyone says the same, except the voice.{Hushed, frightened}The voice says it backward.

topics.topic_text: {Dog}I had other questions for you.
topics.response_text: Dog is getting tired, Master.{Grumbling, slight threat}When can Dog eat?

topics.topic_text: Me hear voice, too? Then got here, bad place.
topics.response_text: {Nods gravely}Dog trapped here, too. This place not like West. Air like copper wire. Gut heavy, hurts, beeps sometimes.{In this sequence of nodes, Dog and a dumb character are sharing info. It's only available for dumb characters.}

topics.topic_text: Voice in the air?
topics.response_text: {Frowns, getting complicated}Dog hears many voices... one in air.{Scared, thinking about God}The... other one.{Brightens up a bit}And Master. Master is the nicest.{Frowns}Gets mean, mad sometimes. But lets Dog feed.

topics.topic_text: What do you eat?
topics.response_text: {Eager}Dog eats whatever he can catch. Sometimes they run, but Dog is strong, moves fast.

topics.topic_text: Nuh-uh!
topics.response_text: {Nods}Is true. Dog wore it right on his hand, where bear trap is now... he thinks.{Dumb characters still sharing stories about past.}

topics.topic_text: Why you want to look like ground?
topics.response_text: When put it on, hard to see. Hard to see... Dog was told not to be seen then. Same as now, except different.{Dumb story time, cont. Getting confused here. He's remembering his stealth orders back West, where mutants were spies.}

topics.topic_text: Maybe you go back someday.
topics.response_text: All gone.{Beat, a little sadder}All gone.{Beat, slightly stronger}It better now that found{emph}new Master.

topics.topic_text: Where does the voice come from?
topics.response_text: {Slight anger, frustration}Don't know where other voice come from. Wish would go away. Always trying to stop Dog, caging Dog.

topics.topic_text: Sounds like good trade.
topics.response_text: {Pleased, agreeing with player here}Master always feed Dog if not in cage. Master lets Dog do what Dog wants.{Grumbling}Not like other voice in cage. Always mad with Dog, shouting at him.

topics.topic_text: I want to hear more about the Master.
topics.response_text: {Brightening up}He takes care of Dog. He tells Dog what to do. Told Dog to come here, put collars on people.

topics.topic_text: Where's your collar?
topics.response_text: {Quiet, bad dog}Lost it. Got hungry.{Beat}Made the other voice mad, madder than it ever was, mad enough to lock Dog up.

topics.topic_text: What's the other voice?
topics.response_text: {Hushed}Other voice... don't wake him up. When voice wakes up, Dog goes to sleep and voice climbs up in Dog's head.

topics.topic_text: Do you know how to wake him up?
topics.response_text: Sometimes when Dog gets tired. Or eats too much, gets full. Sometimes...{frowns}when Dog goes to the cage... then voice wakes up.

topics.topic_text: Not having your help doesn't matter if this heals you.
topics.response_text: {Dog, slightly sad}Dog understands... Dog has done... bad things, knows why voice was...

topics.topic_text: Then I don't want you to merge, I need you here... Dog, listen to my voice. Dog?
topics.response_text: {Dog, slightly regretful}Dog understands. Need help, need Dog in case.

topics.topic_text: We came this far, I'll manage. Go on, let go.
topics.response_text: {Dog, Quiet}You were there all the time...

topics.topic_text: Dog, Master is here now, Master wants you to stop this.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{Surprised}Master?{Grateful}Master, Dog hoped you would come, voice... voice is going...

topics.topic_text: So the Gala Event was triggered at least once?
topics.response_text: Uh-huh. Master ordered it. "Take places." Then...{frowns}Master went away.{Starts getting quieter}Left Dog... Dog in cage.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01DogDialogueRandomBark
topics.response_text: {Dog voice, frightened}Get away while you can, before he comes back.{Dog is in a cage, locked in by his other (multiple) personality. He's scared, talking to himself, lines should make player sympathetic to him.}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01DogDialogueSpecificBark
topics.response_text: {Dog voice}Noise makes my stomach hurt.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01ETDogBoneBark
topics.response_text: {Slight complaint}Bones. Dog not like bones, don't taste good...{thinking to himself}unless meat on them.{Dog sees the skeletons in the courtyard and says he doesn't like eating bones.}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01ETDogEnterBark
topics.response_text: Cage over there with things to pull, hard to pull, Dog can do it.{Beat, confused}Done it before? Not remember.{<Dog says he has seen a small area with complicated looking switches in it nearby>}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01ETDogGalaBark
topics.response_text: Place with hard to pull things is over there...{looks at player's compass}"W" on your wrist thing?{Remembers how to say "west"}Weh-st. West.{<Dog says the complicated switch thing is in the area to the west>}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01EndingDog
topics.response_text: {Dog Dead: Narration}When Dog fell in the Sierra Madre casino, two died as one.

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01GalaEventActivate
topics.response_text: {Frightened, make player squirm}Dog is scared... wants out of cage. Cage you put me in.{Beat, pleading}Will pull levers, be good, just let Dog{emph}out.{AUDIO: From a speaker.}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01WTDogInsideBark
topics.response_text: {Grumbling}Tired of being inside. Want outside, get food inside Dog.{Dog is tired of being inside when food is outside.}

topics.topic_text: NVDLC01WTDogRoofBark
topics.response_text: {Curious}Why leave a bear trap here, so high up.{Beat, to himself}Someone's arm must have lost it.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER IN IRON SITES
topics.response_text: {Curious, player is pointing a gun at him, he doesn't understand what it means}Don't shoot. Bullets hurt.

topics.topic_text: PLAYER LAY MINE
topics.response_text: {Curious}Want Dog to fetch bomb-thing? Or not touch?

topics.topic_text: PLAYER THROW GRENADE
topics.response_text: {Responding to a grenade being thrown, makes howl like a bomb dropping.}Arooooooooo!

conversation.response_text: {Confused}People missing heads... make mistake coming here.{slightly eager}Make Dog hungry.{Dog sees some headless corpses laid out on clinic tables.}
{A little quiet, dismissive}Hnnh. City smells bad in some places, so bad it makes people fall down.
{1st Time, Switching Station, Slight concern}Really dark down here.{Beat}Smell like oil and 'tronics.{These are the lines Dog says randomly, either with the player or alone.}
Nooooooooooo!{Dog is watching a fireworks display in the sky over the Villa, and he's terrified by the lights and the sounds.}
{Hypnotized by light show in sky}Lights and fire.{Dog is watching a fireworks display in the sky over the Villa, and he's pretty happy about it.}
:: Weeping. ::{Dog is talking to himself, he's been caged in a location, and he's scared and frightened.}
Where are lights. Dog want to see the lights.{Dog is talking to himself, he's been told to wait and watch for a pretty fireworks display in the sky.}
{Blinks at a vending machine}Pretty circle on machine,{emph}all glowing.

{1 - Sad, sing song}...going to make casino burn, no more being...{<Script Notes: Dog and God's personality are waging war on each other in these lines - they blend the words as they fight back and forth.>}

{1D}Hello? Voice? You there?{Waits, deliver this as a snarl}It's Dog...{confused}...Dog can hear himself. Voice is... is in cage? Locked.{<Script Notes: This is after God's personality has been buried.>}
{Sniffs, slightly confused, to himself}Something... wrong in the air.{<Dog sniffs around noticing a gas valve has been turned off.>}
{1 - Sad, sing song}...going to make casino burn, no more being...
{About to set fire to the kitchen, killing himself}All fire now. Burn away voice, leave Dog in peace.{<Dog begins muttering about ending it once and for all>}
{Confused}Why pipe not break.{Puts back into}Pipe. Break.{Frowns, relaxes}Hnh. Leave it, not important.{< Dog notices the valve has been reinforced by the player. "Why won't you break?!" >}
{Slightly insistent.}Pipe{emph}stay broken.{Fixed a pipe, had just twisted it closed, wants it to stay broken so the gas flow is uninterrupted.}

combat.response_text: {Chuckling to himself, playfully, as he readies explosive}Hnnnh-Hnnnh-Hnnnh.
{Howling as on fire, low then builds}Hrnnnnooooo!
Hnnhrr... air smells bad.{<Watching the player enter a poisonous cloud, warning.>}
{Roar as he smashes something through a wall}Hnnnhhhr!
{Waking up after getting knocked out}Nnnnnn... eyes went black.

description:
Dog and God is a 104 year-old Human Male.

A psychologically disturbed nightkin with a split personality. One identity, Dog, is subservient and childlike, while the other, God, is independent and intelligent. Both identities struggle for control, triggered by specific sounds and situations. Dog helps Father Elijah by capturing 'assistants' and fitting them with explosive collars, while God seeks to break free from Elijah's grasp.

Dog and God's Personality: Dual personality: Dog is childlike, subservient, and gluttonous, following orders without question. God is articulate, controlling, and self-preserving, seeking to eliminate Elijah and free himself from exploitation. Both identities view the other as a separate entity that puts them 'in the cage' when not in control.

Dog and God's Backstory: Originally a member of the Master's elite nightkin, the character was psychically linked to the Master and conditioned to slavishly serve him until death. With the destruction of the Mariposa Military Base and the Cathedral, the Master's army fell. The character eventually fell into the hands of Father Elijah, who exploited their conditioning. Over time, the character developed a split personality as a coping mechanism: Dog, the subservient identity that responds to Elijah's voice, and God, the independent identity that emerges when the character hears their own voice via holotape or radio.
